synopsis.text: This heartwarming anime follows the story of Sachiko, a lethargic and unhappy girl who struggles with her picky eating habits, resulting in poor performance at school. One fateful night, a mystical white rabbit appears and whisks her away to the enchanting 'Land of the Moon.' In this fantastical realm, Sachiko encounters a vibrant princess who bears a striking resemblance to herself, yet possesses an energetic, joyful, and healthy disposition. This encounter serves as a catalyst for Sachiko, inspiring her to embark on a journey of self-discovery and transformation, ultimately realizing her potential to embody the same happiness and vitality as her newly discovered 'true self.'
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
